name: Chaos Chambers
description:
Ready to rock? Enter the Chaos Chambers and double tap, double jump, flap and spring your way through utter mayhem!

Chaos Chambers is all about speed and acute accuracy. Rev up your little Cuby dude and let him loose through vast, brightly lit chambers and tunnels when you’ll need to learn to jump high, double jump and flap!

Find the energy for that extra spring in your step to get you through 100’s of brutal obstacles and beware, many eyes will be watching your journey and there are traps a plenty in the Chaos Chambers.

Dodge amongst flying blocks and negotiate floors and ledges that fall away at the slightest touch, run through bubbling pits and alleys that could lead you, well anywhere, timing and bravery is crucial for your survival!
